summary: This document is a deposit account opening application for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas. It outlines the terms and conditions for various account types, including joint accounts, and emphasizes compliance with anti-money laundering regulations. The document also includes sections on customer identification policies and responsibilities for tax obligations.
keyFacts: The document is a deposit account opening application for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
It includes terms and conditions for various account types, including joint accounts.
The document emphasizes compliance with anti-money laundering regulations.
It outlines customer identification policies required by federal law.
There are sections detailing responsibilities for tax obligations for non-US individuals and organizations.
